response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value and could potentially transform your business or personal endeavors. I understand that the true worth of this product may be subjective and varies greatly depending on its application and importance to you. With that in mind, I am offering you the chance to own this exceptional item at a special introductory price of $950,000.

This offer is exclusive to you and represents a significant discount compared to the market value, making it an attractive proposition. I believe that by seizing this opportunity, you can unlock new possibilities and achieve your goals more efficiently.

Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions regarding the product's features, benefits, or how it might fit into your plans. I am here to provide all the necessary information and support to help you make an informed decision.

Looking forward to your response,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
